note.p: Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1926 vol 99 pp xxvii-xxxii, plate, signed by J B
Notes: DSB gives place of birth as Wednesbury, Staffordshire, and place of death as London.
References: W van der Kloot, 'Ernest Starling's analysis of the energy balance of the German people during the blockade, 1914-19' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 185-193
A F Bristow, T Barrowcliffe and D R Bangham, 'Standardization of biological medicines: the first hundred years, 1900-2000' in NR 2006 vol 60 pp 271-289
